Question:
In each of the following questions find out the alternative which will replace the question mark.

PASS : QBTT :: FAIL : ?


A. GJBM
B. GBJM
C. MBJG
D. MJBG

In each of the following questions find out the alternative which will replace the question mark.

BLOCKED : YOLXPVW :: ? : OZFMXS


A. DEBATE
B. RESULT
C. LABOR
D. LAUNCH

In each of the following questions find out the alternative which will replace the question mark.

CEDH : HDEC :: ? : PNRV


A. VRNP
B. RNPV
C. NRVP
D. VNRP
Solution:
CEDH -- Reverse it --->  HDEC.
VRNP -- Reverse it ---> PNRV.
Therefore VRNP is the answer.
